definition: to lose/to leave behind/to omit/to bequeath/sth lost/involuntary discharge (of urine etc)

pinyin: Shi4 jie4 Wen2 hua4 Yi2 chan3
shi4 jie4 wen2 hua4 yi2 chan3 di4
Fei1 wu4 zhi4 Wen2 hua4 Yi2 chan3

sentences.english: but he left it to him on such terms as destroyed half the value of the bequest .
sentences.chinese: 但是，因爲附有條件，這份遺產便失去了一半價值。

sentences.english: It surely ranks among the most valuable literary artifacts in America.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，它算得上美國最珍貴的文學遺產之一。

sentences.english: This, it appears, is the legacy I have received and have now bequeathed to my own child.
sentences.chinese: 而這，正是我已收到並留給自己孩子的遺產。

sentences.english: The estimated six to seven thousand languages spoken around the globe are the repository of our collective memory and intangible heritage.
sentences.chinese: 這六七千種語言承載者我們共同的回憶和非物質遺產。

sentences.english: The Soul Reaver is a weapon in the Legacy of Kain series.
sentences.chinese: 搜魂劍是凱恩的遺產系列裏的一把武器。

sentences.english: Dazu Rock Carvings in 1999 was inscribed on the World Heritage List.
sentences.chinese: 大足石刻1999年被列入世界文化遺產名錄。

sentences.english: Best straighten up for a longer legacy.
sentences.chinese: 最好的整頓較長的遺產。

sentences.english: It was designated a world heritage site by UNESCO in 1987.
sentences.chinese: 1987年，聯合國科教文組織將它選爲世界遺產。

sentences.english: Women in the MENA have the right to inheritance.
sentences.chinese: 中東與北非地區的婦女具有遺產繼承權。

sentences.english: Is that impression a cultural heritage?
sentences.chinese: 這個印象是文化遺產嗎？

sentences.english: But they are part of our heritage nonetheless.
sentences.chinese: 但是他們也是我們遺產的一部分。

sentences.english: That’s why Wikipedia is an ideal candidate to set the World Heritage List right.
sentences.chinese: 這就是爲什麼維基百科被題名列入世界遺產之列。

sentences.english: Cultural diversity is our shared heritage and the greatest opportunity before humanity.
sentences.chinese: 文化多樣性是我們的共同遺產和人類之大幸。

sentences.english: We are the keepers of this legacy.
sentences.chinese: 我們是這個遺產的保存者。

sentences.english: The rock paintings in Cangyuan are the treasure of the Yunnan minority culture.
sentences.chinese: 滄源崖畫是雲南少數民族文化藝術遺產中的瑰寶。

sentences.english: These ancient paintings are part of the cultural heritage.
sentences.chinese: 這些古畫是文化遺產的一部分。

definition: to pass on (to future generations)/passed on (from former times)/a continued tradition/an inheritance
to inherit/to succeed to (the throne etc)/to carry on (a tradition etc)
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
valuable/precious/to value/to treasure/to set store by
to maintain (that sth is true)/to determine (a fact)/determination (of an amount)/of the firm opinion/to believe firmly/to set one's mind on/to identify with
